summary: Shift to a 3D tractor–trolley farming game with updatable content, intended for eventual Play Store release (likely via Android WebView/wrapper if built as web).
architectural_notes: Target experience is 3D tractor + trolley farming game with future updates.
Planned distribution includes Play Store; likely requires an Android wrapper/WebView if the game is web-based.

existing_features.title: Create a playable tractor-themed game in the React frontend with simple, well-defined gameplay loops (start, play, game over, restart) and basic controls suitable for desktop and mobile (keyboard + on-screen controls).

Design the game to be content-driven so future updates can be applied by changing server-provided configuration rather than rewriting core gameplay code. The frontend must load a 'GameConfig' from the backend on startup (e.g., map/track layout, tractor speed, obstacle density, scoring rules) and use it to drive gameplay.
Add an admin-only UI to update the GameConfig (future updates) using Internet Identity authentication, with access restricted to a configurable admin Principal stored in the backend.
Create a coherent, distinct visual theme for the tractor game UI (colors, typography, layout, and component styling) and apply it consistently across the game screens.
Add static art assets for the tractor game (background/field, tractor, obstacles/collectibles) under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the game UI.

Implement a 3D version of the tractor game using React Three Fiber, including a controllable tractor with an attached trolley driving in a farm environment, while keeping the existing start/play/game-over/restart loop and supporting both keyboard and on-screen controls.

Add farming gameplay activities as core loops (e.g., plowing, sowing, watering, harvesting) that can be performed with the tractor–trolley in the 3D world, with clear objectives and completion/failure conditions tied into the game loop.

Extend the content-driven GameConfig so 3D scene parameters and farming-activity parameters can be updated from the backend, and ensure the frontend loads and applies this GameConfig on startup and during admin updates (without requiring gameplay code changes for tuning/balancing).

Add a Play Store–friendly delivery path by making the game UI fully mobile-responsive and adding developer documentation explaining how to wrap the web build in an Android WebView/wrapper for Play Store upload.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a tractor-themed game designed to support future updates (updatable content/features).
Implement Motoko backend APIs to store and serve the current GameConfig and to persist basic player results (e.g., recent scores and best scores).
Build the game in 3D (tractor + tractor-trolley) rather than 2D/top-down.
Add farming gameplay activities (e.g., plowing/sowing/harvesting/watering) as core loops for the tractor-trolley game.
Support packaging/release path for Play Store upload (e.g., Android wrapper/WebView around the game, basic mobile-ready controls).

projectName: 3D Tractor-Trolley Farming Game with Content Updates Support
